job.title: Sr. Software Development Engineer in Test
job.industry: Marketing and Advertising,Information Technology and Services,Computer Software
job.description: At Sonos we want to create the ultimate listening experience for our customers and know that it starts by listening to each other. As part of the Sonos team, you’ll collaborate with people of all styles, skill sets, and backgrounds to realize our vision while fostering a community where everyone feels included and empowered to do the best work of their lives.  As a Sr SDET, you will represent the Software Quality Engineering discipline in the Professional software group. You will strive for service engineering excellence and will be a hands-on leader who will drive design for the Cloud CI/CD deployment pipeline and develop test automation.  This will require collaboration with DevOps and multiple quality teams to design, enhance existing pipelines and execute automation test strategies in order to deliver high quality products..  What You’ll Do What You’ll Need
